== Chicalim (CT) (626885) ==

Chicalim (CT) is a town in the [[MORMUGAO 001]] taluka of [[SOUTH GOA]] district with an area of 12.19 sq. km. and harbouring 1483 households with total population of 6933 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 23 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 3921 and female population is 3012. Scheduled Caste population is 76 and Scheduled Tribes population is 234. Census Location Code of the town is 626885<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 189 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 507 km. Railway station is at DABOLIM at a distance of 1 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1975 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MORMUGAO (5 km) .
